description.original: Adds Discord-like syntax for inline spoilers.
description.translation: Adds Discord-like syntax for inline spoilers.

dict..setName(\"Hide spoilers in editor view: .setName("在编辑器视图中隐藏剧透 (实验性功能)")
dict..setDesc(\"Always show all inline spoile: .setDesc("始终显示所有内联剧透，无论是否被点击。")
dict..setDesc(\"Hide spoilers in the editor u: .setDesc("在编辑器中隐藏剧透，直到光标移动到与剧透同一行时才显示。")
